fun to boot up every once in a while and just enjoy the mayhem of this old ass game. So many good maps on here.

just got vacbanned on this game for injecting a file on acciddent while i was in the middle of a game. either way, this game is pretty awful due to the fact its literally a decade old. you wouldnt believe the amounts of times i've run into cheaters just aimbotting everyone with a BAR or STG44 over and over and over.

this shit is unbelievably boring and only 5 servers get more than 10 players on a daily, but the funny part is most of those servers are just clan servers with middle aged men and women playing them. i never thought i'd see people likely over the age of 20 playing a source game made 10 years ago. 

-5/50

Unique yet classic realistic-style graphics, good map design, simple yet effective gameplay, small yet loyal community, and surprisingly chill. Despite the lack of modelled & animated facial expressions, updates, support and smooth menus, this game sill holds up to this day. The game still has a moderate number of servers active compared to some similar games made by VALVE, and it is still tons of fun. You will NOT regret playing this in 2021.

There is something wrong when a game this old is better than COD: World War 2.
Get this, it is cheaper, better, more fun, than COD: WW2.
Classic. I've spent a month and a half of my life playing this game.

One of the best online game about WWII. Murder them nazis. ehe ehe ehe. A few parts of the online community can be toxic at times which is amazing given the few people left who play this game. There are bad days and then there are legendary bad days. Days of defeat.
